Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>!
I'm glad I ran into you!
There's something I want to give you!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bought it at a bargain price in the
next town over.
Look, a <GREEN>fishing rod</GREEN>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With this, you can <RED>catch fish at
fishing points</RED>! There are all kinds
of fish to catch, so try it out!
<PAGE>
Would you like me to explain to you
how to fish?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let me explain it to you.
Come with me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a <GREEN>fishing point</GREEN>.
You can easily tell where fishing points
are because there is a pier.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
At a fishing point with your <GREEN>fishing rod</GREEN>
equipped, press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE>. Your lure
will float on the surface of the water.
<PAGE>
Then you wait for a fish to bite.
When one bites, tap the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE>
repeatedly to reel it in.
<PAGE>
Isn't that easy?
You can cook the fish you catch, so
definitely give it a try!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all from me, then, <MYNAME>.
Good luck!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all from me, then, <MYNAME>.
Good luck!
